title: Introduction to Tailoring
summary: Tailoring involves cutting, sewing, and finishing fabric to create clothing. It’s a high-demand skill in local markets.
tip: Start by learning fabric types and simple hand stitches.

title: Barbing Basics
summary: Barbing requires hygiene, steady hands, and knowledge of hair patterns. Learn clipper handling and style names.
tip: Practice fade cuts using a mirror and simple styles first.

title: Phone Repair 101

tip: Buy cheap broken phones to practice your repair skills.

title: Soap Making
summary: Soap making is profitable and simple. You need caustic soda, oil, and fragrance.
